name: 8th International Conference on Advanced Research in Teaching and Education
content: Explore new discoveries and methods in the world of teaching and academia at ICATE 2024\. At this global education conference, we will bring together different disciplines of research and education, engage in discussions about the biggest hindrances in the field, and discuss innovative solutions for them. Moreover, understand how to eliminate the spaces between academic disciplines — thereby increasing the chance of partnerships and collaborations. Witness our most versatile and informative conference education 2024 yet, with attendees from all around the world. In the previous years, our participants poured in from countries like Cameroon, Croatia, Portugal, South Africa, India, Japan, Italy, and many others. Despite the pandemic moving us online for a couple of years, we continued to successfully host our education conferences and provide a world-class experience to all our attendees. Join us in Prague this year and interact with an impressive collection of academics, researchers, scholars, leaders of for-and non-profits, and other important stakeholders in these fields. Engage in discussions and conversations about topics like global citizen preparation, enhancing early childhood education, positive psychology in education, determination of science teachers’ competencies, and many more. Finally, bring awareness to the pressing concerns seen in various areas, and how we can rectify them.
